LC50; Species: Bufo americanus (American toad), tadpoles; Conditions: static, 20-24 °C, pH 7.6-8.1, hardness 90-115 mg/L; Concentration: 9.97 ug/L (95% Confidence Levels: 7.21-13.53 mg/L); Exposure was initiated 2-6 hr after spawning and continued to 4 days post-hatching. Hatching times varied between 3 and 4 days, therefore, exposure varied between 7 and 8 days. /Capacitor 21/

LC50; Species: Bufo fowleri (Fowler's toad), tadpoles; Conditions: static, 20-24 °C, pH 7.6-8.1, hardness 90-115 mg/L; Concentration: 28.02 ug/L (95% Confidence Levels: 22.59-34.47 mg/L); Exposure was initiated 2-6 hr after spawning and continued to 4 days post-hatching. Hatching times varied between 3 and 4 days, therefore, exposure varied between 7 and 8 days. /Capacitor 21/

LC50; Species: Rana pipiens (Leopard frog), tadpoles; Conditions: static, 20-24 °C, pH 7.6-8.1, hardness 90-115 mg/L; Concentration: 2.87 ug/L (95% Confidence Levels: 2.29-3.57 mg/L); Exposure was initiated 2-6 hr after spawning and continued to 4 days post-hatching. Hatching times varied between 3 and 4 days, therefore, exposure varied between 7 and 8 days. /Capacitor 21/
